TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit StronglyTypedResourceBuilder extends System.Object
public ref class StronglyTypedResourceBuilder abstract sealed

summary.span: 为强类型资源提供支持。

span.span: Provides support for strongly typed resources.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，资源将代码从应用程序中的内容。Typically, resources separate code from content within an application. 创建和使用这些资源可以更轻松地开发可本地化的应用程序。Creating and consuming these resources makes it easier to develop localizable applications. 在.NET Framework 中，会占用的资源通常通过使用类，该类包含在运行时提供对区域性特定资源的访问的方法。In the .NET Framework, resources are usually consumed by using the class, which contains methods that provide access to culture-specific resources at run time. 有关创建和使用资源的详细信息，请参阅[桌面应用中的资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ad495d4-2941-40cf-bf64-e82e85825890)。For more information about creating and consuming resources, see [Resources in Desktop Apps](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ad495d4-2941-40cf-bf64-e82e85825890). 强类型的资源支持是通过创建包含一组的静态的的类，只读封装对资源的访问一个编译时功能 (`get`) 属性。Strongly typed resource support is a compile-time feature that encapsulates access to resources by creating classes that contain a set of static, read-only (`get`) properties. 这提供了一种替代方式来使用资源而不是调用和方法。This provides an alternative way to consume resources instead of calling the and methods. 提供强类型的资源支持的基本功能类 (以及`/str`中的命令行选项[Resgen.exe （资源文件生成器）](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md))。The basic functionality for strongly typed resource support is provided by the class (as well as the `/str` command-line option in the [Resgen.exe (Resource File Generator)](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md)). 输出方法是包含输入参数中引用的资源相匹配的强类型的属性的类。The output of the method is a class that contains strongly typed properties that match the resources that are referenced in the input parameter. 此类提供对可用资源的处理的文件中的只读访问。This class provides read-only access to the resources that are available in the file processed. ## Examples 下面的示例生成一个名为类`DemoResources`C# 或 Visual Basic 中写入 （具体取决于本示例的源代码中）。The following example generates a class named `DemoResources` that is written in C# or Visual Basic (depending on the example's source code). 此类位于`DemoApp`命名空间并具有返回徽标的位图和应用程序的名称的属性。This class is in the `DemoApp` namespace and has properties that return the bitmap of a logo and the name of an application. 该示例通过调用`CreateResourceFile`方法来创建必要的.resw 文件，需要一个名为 Logo.bmp 的位图文件找示例的当前目录中。The example calls a `CreateResourceFile` method to create the necessary .resw file and requires that a bitmap file named Logo.bmp be found in the example's current directory. 代码示例使用名为 demo.resx 的以下资源文件：The code example uses the following resource file, named demo.resx: [!code-csharp[System.Resources.Tools.StronglyTypedResourceBuilder.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.tools.stronglytypedresourcebuilder.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.Tools.StronglyTypedResourceBuilder.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.tools.stronglytypedresourcebuilder.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] 应用程序代码可以使用类，如下所示：Your application code can then use the class as follows: [!code-csharp[System.Resources.Tools.StronglyTypedResourceBuilder.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.tools.stronglytypedresourcebuilder.class/cs/demoresources.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.Tools.StronglyTypedResourceBuilder.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.tools.stronglytypedresourcebuilder.class/vb/demoresources.vb#2)]

summary.span: 生成一个类文件，该文件包含与输入参数中所指定的资源相匹配的强类型属性。

span.span: Generates a class file that contains strongly typed properties that match the resources that are specified in the input parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit Create (System.Collections.IDictionary resourceList, string baseName, string generatedCodeNamespace, System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider codeProvider, bool internalClass, out string[] unmatchable);

.method public static hidebysig class System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit Create(class System.Collections.IDictionary resourceList, string baseName, string generatedCodeNamespace, class System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider codeProvider, bool internalClass, [out] string[]& unmatchable) cil managed

Public Shared Function Create (resourceList As IDictionary, baseName As String, generatedCodeNamespace As String, codeProvider As CodeDomProvider, internalClass As Boolean, ByRef unmatchable As String()) As CodeCompileUnit

public: static System::CodeDom::CodeCompileUnit ^ Create(System::Collections::IDictionary ^ resourceList, System::String ^ baseName, System::String ^ generatedCodeNamespace, System::CodeDom::Compiler::CodeDomProvider ^ codeProvider, bool internalClass, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] cli::array <System::String ^> ^ % unmatchable);

param.name: resourceList
param.span: 一个 集合，其中每个字典条目键值对都是资源的名称以及资源的值。

span.span: An collection where each dictionary entry key/value pair is the name of a resource and the value of the resource.

param.name: baseName
param.span: 要生成的类的名称。

span.span: The name of the class to be generated.

param.name: generatedCodeNamespace
param.span: 要生成的类的命名空间。

span.span: The namespace of the class to be generated.

param.name: codeProvider
param.span: 一个 类，该类提供生成该类所使用的语言。

span.span: A class that provides the language in which the class will be generated.

param.name: internalClass
param.span: 如果生成内部类，则为 ；如果生成公共类，则为 。

span.span: to generate an internal class; to generate a public class.

param.name: unmatchable
param.span: 一个数组，该数组包含无法为其生成属性的每个资源名称。

span.span: An array that contains each resource name for which a property cannot be generated.

param.span: 通常，无法生成属性是因为该资源名称不是有效的标识符。

span.span: Typically, a property cannot be generated because the resource name is not a valid identifier.

summary.span: 生成一个类文件，该文件包含与指定集合中引用的资源相匹配的强类型的属性。

span.span: Generates a class file that contains strongly typed properties that match the resources referenced in the specified collection.
A container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来生成一个类，提供强类型的只读包装，访问资源中包含的`resourceList`参数。Use the method to generate a class that provides a strongly typed, read-only wrapper to access the resources that are contained in the `resourceList` parameter. 类将忽略任何资源名称开头的字符"$"或">>"。The class ignores any resource name that begins with the characters "$" or ">>". 资源名称"区域性"和"ResourceManager"是无效的标识符。The resource names "Culture" and "ResourceManager" are invalid identifiers.

span.span: , , or is .

exception.span: 资源节点名称与其在 中的键不匹配。

span.span: A resource node name does not match its key in .

A container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载使你能够使用`resourcesNamespace`参数来指定生成的资源的命名空间。This overload enables you to use the `resourcesNamespace` parameter to specify the namespace for the generated resources. 在这种情况下，生成的代码如下所示：In this case, the generated code appears as follows: ``` System.Resources.ResourceManager rm = new System.Resources.ResourceManager(".",typeof(baseName).Assembly); ``` 在大多数情况下，你不需要在应用程序代码中调用此方法。In most cases, you do not need to call this method from your application code. 类将忽略任何资源名称开头的字符"$"或">>"。The class ignores any resource name that begins with the characters "$" or ">>". 资源名称"区域性"和"ResourceManager"是无效的标识符。The resource names "Culture" and "ResourceManager" are invalid identifiers.

span.span: , , or is .

exception.span: 资源节点名称与其在 中的键不匹配。

span.span: A resource node name does not match its key in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来生成一个类，提供强类型的只读访问的资源中包含的`resxFile`参数。Use the method to generate a class that provides strongly typed, read-only access to the resources that are contained in the `resxFile` parameter. 类将忽略任何资源名称开头的字符"$"或">>"。The class ignores any resource name that begins with the characters "$" or ">>". 资源名称"区域性"和"ResourceManager"是无效的标识符。The resource names "Culture" and "ResourceManager" are invalid identifiers.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string VerifyResourceName (string key, System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider provider);
.method public static hidebysig string VerifyResourceName(string key, class System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider provider) cil managed
Public Shared Function VerifyResourceName (key As String, provider As CodeDomProvider) As String
public: static System::String ^ VerifyResourceName(System::String ^ key, System::CodeDom::Compiler::CodeDomProvider ^ provider);

param.name: key
param.span: 待验证的字符串，如有必要，则转换为有效的资源名称。

span.span: The string to verify and, if necessary, convert to a valid resource name.

param.name: provider
param.span: 对象，它指定将使用的目标语言。

span.span: A object that specifies the target language to use.

summary.span: 根据指定的输入字符串和代码提供程序，生成一个有效的资源字符串。

span.span: Generates a valid resource string based on the specified input string and code provider.

returns.span: 派生自 参数的有效资源名称。

span.span: A valid resource name derived from the parameter.

returns.span: 如果根据 参数所指定的语言，派生的字符串仍包含无效字符，所有无效标记都会被下划线 (_) 字符或 替代。

span.span: Any invalid tokens are replaced with the underscore (_) character, or if the derived string still contains invalid characters according to the language specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`key`参数有效字符串的字符，则返回该字符串。If the `key` parameter is a valid string of characters, that string is returned. 如果`key`参数是无效的字符串或包含无效字符的字符串方法尝试生成有效的字符串基于`key`和`provider`参数。If the `key` parameter is an invalid string or a string that contains invalid characters, the method attempts to generate a valid string based on the `key` and `provider` parameters. 如果可以生成有效的字符串，返回字符串;否则为`null`返回。If a valid string can be generated, that string is returned; otherwise, `null` is returned. 如果`key`参数为空字符串 ("")，则返回一个字符串，包含单个下划线字符 (_)。If the `key` parameter is an empty string (""), a string that consists of a single underscore character (_) is returned. 如果`key`参数不是空字符串，方法比较到一组基于所指定的语言的无效标记字符串中的每个字符`provider`参数。If the `key` parameter is not an empty string, the method compares each character in the string to a set of invalid tokens based on the language specified by the `provider` parameter. 在字符串中的任何无效字符替换为下划线字符开头。Any invalid character in the string is replaced with an underscore character. 将替换为下划线的字符如下所示：The characters that will be replaced with an underscore are as follows: （空格）、 U + 00A0 （不间断空格）。（句点），（逗号），;（分号），|，~，@，'#'、 %、 ^，&、 \*，+、-，'/'，'\\'，'\<，> '，'？，[，]，'（'，'），{，}，"（引号），' '（单引号），:，和 ！。' ' (space), U+00A0 (non-breaking space), '.' (period), ',' (comma), ';' (semicolon), '|', '~', '@', '#', '%', '^', '&', '\*', '+', '-', '/', '\\', '\<', '>', '?', '[', ']', '(', ')', '{', '}', '"' (quote), ''' (apostrophe), ':', and '!'. > [!NOTE] > 强类型的资源不允许使用语言关键字 (如`if`， `for`，依次类推) 用作资源键名称。Strongly typed resources do not allow the use of language keywords (such as `if`, `for`, and so on) as resource key names. 但是，设计模式允许通过在关键字前面加下划线字符的语言关键字的使用。However, the design pattern allows the use of language keywords by prefixing the keyword with the underscore character. 方法调用方法来强制实施此设计。The method calls the method to enforce this design. 例如，如果你使用的资源名称，等同于语言关键字，如`for`，该名称显示为`_for`生成强类型的资源类中。For example, if you use a resource name that is the same as a language keyword, such as `for`, the name appears as `_for` in the generated strongly typed resource class.

span.span: or is .
